title: which would be a better pick

comments.body:
The question is do you really wanna go to meghalaya?
Nobody would speak your language there and it's not like hyderabad or Chennai which are just a train ride away. You'd have to spend a lot of money flight tickets. 
There's gonna be a culture shock for you.

I personally wouldn't go to meghalaya just for the nit tag even though it is cse just cause of the language and culture thing.
 I can't really speak about nit meghalaya's placements stats but I can assure they are nothing like top nits, dtu, nsut etc. 
If you wanna know about pes' placements stats you can just search them up on the sub
but the nit tag will help during masters right
fr? coz like I've been regretting not picking nit meghalaya for this reason
So let me get this straight, you've already made the decision? If you have, just live with it.
No Indian uni will help you in masters on its own
oh so the tier 2 nit won't give me any sorta tag preferences?
calling nit Meghalaya tier 2 is bit of a stretch.
tier 3* and I'm hoping that it's gonna be of no help during masters.
